channel.title: Opulent - 317 Loading 474 - Release
channel.description:
LINKS
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/9kdlb9bggnmq9cf/Opulent+client.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/9kdlb9bggnmq9cf/Opulent+client.zip[/url] Client [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/qwd7cfj0dovkflv/Opulent+source.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/qwd7cfj0dovkflv/Opulent+source.zip[/url] Source [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/detnn7eb6wv244a/deps.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/detnn7eb6wv244a/deps.zip[/url] Deps [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?mq8yhs18zaq7oas]https://www.mediafire.com/?mq8yhs18zaq7oas[/url] Cache
Cache auto-downloads, named 474Beta and is downloaded in your users folder. Use eclipse for the source
[B][COLOR=red]If you want a compiler and run for the source, use Project Organic's[/COLOR].[/B] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/437084-project-organic-474-gameframe-maps-objects-anims-good-skilling-combat-content.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/437084-project-organic-474-gameframe-maps-objects-anims-good-skilling-combat-content.html[/url]
Sorry for the people who wanted to play this. I decided to move on to higher revision servers, so I'm releasing this project. It only lasted like two weeks so there wasn't too much done from the source and client I started with. I was aiming at sort of a remake kind of thing but I changed my mind so the server isn't really download & host.
Media and features
[size=4][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size]
[I][COLOR=green]Green[/COLOR] - Complete [COLOR=orange]Orange[/COLOR] - Incomplete [COLOR=red]Red[/COLOR] - Not Started [/I]
[b][SIZE=4]Face-to-Face Combat[/SIZE][/b]
[ul][*][COLOR=green]Clipped following/aggressiveness[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Weapon poison[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Requirements to equip[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Perfect switching[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Degradable/chargeable items[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]All special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Armor/weapon effects[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]PvP and PvM[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]MvM[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Bosses[/COLOR][/ul]
[b][SIZE=4]Magic[/SIZE][/b]
[ul][*][COLOR=green]Modern Spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Lunar Spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Ancient Spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Clipped projectiles[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Telekinetic Grab[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Tele-Other[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Bones to ___[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Weakness spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Binding[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]God spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Charging orbs[/COLOR][/ul]
[b][SIZE=4]Ranging[/SIZE][/b]
[ul][*][COLOR=green]Normal Bows[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Crossbows[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Composite Bows[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Throwing weapons[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Ranging Guild[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Clipped projectiles[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Accurate, rapid, and long range[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Bolt Specials[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Correct ammo[/COLOR][/ul]
[b][SIZE=4]Skilling[/SIZE][/b]
[SIZE=3]Firemaking[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Clipped[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]All logs can be burned[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Ashes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Can't make fires in buildings[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Clipped[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Woodcutting[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]All trees can be cut down[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Tree spirit and birds' nest random[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Correct time-to-cut formula[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Prayer[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Bones on Altar[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Ecto-Fountain[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]All Prayers working[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Crafting[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Leather Crafting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Complete Jewelry Making[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Pottery[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Flething[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Complete Bow and Crossbow Fletching[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Complete Arrow and Bolt Making[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Herblore[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Herb Cleaning[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Complete Potion Making[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Grinding[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Mining[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Prospecting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Ores Deplete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Random Gems[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Rock Golem random[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Pickaxe and Mining level affect mining speed[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Smithing[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Smithing Interface[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Smelt x5, x10, xX[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Fishing[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Casket Random[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Bait and Feathers required[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Cooking[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Cooking Timer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Food burns based on level[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Miscellaneous food making (Pizzas, pies, etc)[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Thieving[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Steal from Stalls[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Pick lock chests[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Runecrafting[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Tiara Making[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Abyssal Rift[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Multipliers and Pouches[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Altar Locating[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=3]Slayer[/SIZE]
[ul] [*][COLOR=green]Slayer Gem[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Completed NPC placements for all dungeons[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Dozens of tasks to complete[/COLOR] [/ul]
[size=4][u][b]Quests:[/b][/u][/size]
[size=2][u][b]Current Quests[/b][/u][/size] [code] Cook's Assistant Druidic Ritual Desert Treasure Vampire Slayer Imp Catcher [/code]
[size=2][u][b]Future Quests[/b][/u][/size] [code] Demon Slayer Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer Elemental Workshop I, The Elemental Workshop II, The Fremennik Isles, The Fremennik Trials, The Gertrude's Cat Grand Tree, The Heroes' Quest Holy Grail Horror From the Deep Legends' Quest Lost City Monkey Madness Nature Spirit Recipe For Disaster Shield of Arrav Witch's House Possibly more [/code]
[size=7][u][b]General Media[/b][/u][/size]
[spoiler=General Media] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jc4e.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jc9u.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7jh.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7VC.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7B5.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7GZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7Ng.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L7QY.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Mzhg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6NbRo[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Ndtg.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jef7.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jeqv.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jewi.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6JeT8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jf8H.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jf5q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6Jftk.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6L88H.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
I'll be releasing some of the quests I made soon btw
Known bugs:
[code] Following is a bit glitching but it's still clipped Loading bar goes too far to the right Music doesn't fade when you log in [/code]
post more if you find any
Credits:
Organic

Nono, I am past that, it is time for Mezzyscape 317 loading 474 loading 562

^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:50: cannot find symbol symbol : class QuestTab location: class server.model.players.Client private QuestTab questtab = new QuestTab(this); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : class QuestRewards location: class server.model.players.Client private QuestRewards questrewards = new QuestRewards(this); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:119: cannot find symbol symbol : variable TreasureTrails location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickItem TreasureTrails.addClueReward(c, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:124: cannot find symbol symbol : variable TreasureTrails location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickItem TreasureTrails.addClueReward(c, 2); item.title: Opulent - 317 Loading 474 - Release
item.dc:creator: @Artorias Artorias
item.description:
@Artorias wrote:

LINKS

http://www.mediafire.com/download/9kdlb9bggnmq9cf/Opulent+client.zip Client
http://www.mediafire.com/download/qwd7cfj0dovkflv/Opulent+source.zip Source
http://www.mediafire.com/download/detnn7eb6wv244a/deps.zip Deps
https://www.mediafire.com/?mq8yhs18zaq7oas Cache

Cache auto-downloads, named 474Beta and is downloaded in your users folder.
Use eclipse for the source

[B][COLOR=red]If you want a compiler and run for the source, use Project Organic’s[/COLOR].[/B]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/437084-project-organic-474-gameframe-maps-objects-anims-good-skilling-combat-content.html

Sorry for the people who wanted to play this. I decided to move on to higher revision servers, so I’m releasing this project. It only lasted like two weeks so there wasn’t too much done from the source and client I started with. I was aiming at sort of a remake kind of thing but I changed my mind so the server isn’t really download & host.

Media and features

[size=4]Features:[/size]

[I][COLOR=green]Green[/COLOR] - Complete
[COLOR=orange]Orange[/COLOR] - Incomplete
[COLOR=red]Red[/COLOR] - Not Started
[/I]

[SIZE=4]Face-to-Face Combat[/SIZE]

[ul][][COLOR=green]Clipped following/aggressiveness[/COLOR]
